thread.title: Justin Bieber Gets Giant Eagle Tattoo on Stomach, Sweetly Dances Shirtless With Older Female Fan
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Gets Giant Eagle Tattoo on Stomach, Sweetly Dances Shirtless With Older Female Fan

author: Jackie Willis
title: Justin Bieber Gets Giant Eagle Tattoo on Stomach, Sweetly Dances Shirtless With Older Female Fan
text: Justin Bieber Gets Giant Eagle Tattoo on Stomach, Sweetly Dances Shirtless With Older Female Fan by Jackie Willis 7:40 AM PDT, March 21, 2017 Photo: Instagram Justin Bieber has yet another reason to walk around shirtless. On Monday, the 23-year-old pop star posted a selfie video to his Instagram story that showcased a large eagle tattoo on his stomach that is situated between his "Son of God" and "Purpose" tattoo. Photo: Instagram WATCH: Nick Carter Says Justin Bieber and His Wild Antics 'Couldn't Hold a Candle' to What Backstreet Boys Did In addition to showing up his fresh ink, Bieber also shared two videos of himself and an older lady happily dancing with one another. Needless to say, he did not put on a shirt for the occasion, but his fan didn't seem to mind.
